This filigree grants you, as the clan dagger's owner, a +2 item bonus to Society checks and to Diplomacy checks to Request. Additionally, once per day, the filigree symbol can be activated to compel an enemy to act.

Frequency once per day

Effect You command a creature within 30 feet to Stride away from you, drop @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone], or release one item it's holding. The creature can choose to perform that action as the first action on its next turn; if it doesn't, it takes @Damage[8d6[mental]|traits:auditory,concentrate,linguistic,mental] damage (@Check[will|dc:28|basic|traits:auditory,concentrate,linguistic,mental] save).
